metadata.subject: Camus, Jean-Pierre, 1584-1652
Censorship
metadata.title: Advis docrtinal de Monsieur de Sponde Euesque de Pamiers, sur le liure De l'ouvrage des moynes
metadata.creator: Sponde, Henry de,1568-1643
Sponde, Henry de, 1568-1643
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 1 no. 39
metadata.description: Includes also an Advis doctrinal" on the same subject by Eustachius a Sancto Paulo (18 April 1632); and: Advis doctrinal des Sievrs Du Val, Le Clerc, Ysambert, Charton & Lescot docteurs de Sorbonne, sur le traité de la pauureté euangelique, traité de la desappropriation claustrale, & sur le rebat-joye du triomphe monachal (9 February 1634)
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover page.
